renderpass.code:
// wireframe code from FabriceNeyret2: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XfS3DK

#define O(x,a,b) smoothstep(0., 1., cos(x*6.2832)*.5+.5)*(a-b)+b  // oscillate between a & b
#define A(v) mat2(cos((v*3.1416) + vec4(0, -1.5708, 1.5708, 0)))  // rotate
#define s(p1, p2) c += .02/abs(L( u, K(p1, v, h), K(p2, v, h) )+.01)*k;  // segment

#define n1Q(p) p *= ri(round(atan(p.x, p.y) * 4.) / 4.)
#define ri(a) mat2(cos(a + asin(vec4(0,1,-1,0))))
float L(vec2 p, vec3 A, vec3 B)
{
    vec2 a = A.xy, 
   
         b = B.xy - a;
         p -= a;
          n1Q(p.xy);
            n1Q(A.xy);
    float h = clamp(dot(p, b) / dot(b, b), 0., 1.);
    return length(p - b*h) + .01*mix(A.z, B.z, h);
}

// cam
vec3 K(vec3 p, mat2 v, mat2 h)
{
  
    p.zy *= v; // pitch
    p.zx *= h; // yaw
   ;
    if (texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(80, 2), 0).x < 1.) // P key
  
        p *= 6. / (p.z+6.); // perspective view
    return p;
}

void mainImage( out vec4 C, in vec2 U )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         u = (U+U-R)/R.y*2.,
         m = (iMouse.xy*2.-R)/R.y;
    
    float t = iTime/60.,
          o = t*6.;

    
    if (iMouse.z < 1.) // not clicking
        m = vec2(sin(t*6.2832)*2., sin(t*6.2832*2.)); // fig-8 movement
    
    mat2 v = A(m.y), // pitch
         h = A(m.x); // yaw
    
    vec3 c = vec3(0), p, 
         k = vec3(1,1,4)/40. + .05;
    
  
    

    {
        k = k.bgr; // shift color
  
        p = vec3(
            O(o,   1.,  .382), 
            O(o, .618, -.618), 
            O(o, .382,    1.));
        s( vec3(-p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3(-p.z, -p.x,    0) )
        s( vec3(-p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3( p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3( p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.z, -p.x,    0), vec3( p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.z, -p.x,    0), vec3( p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3( p.z, -p.x,    0) )
        s( vec3( p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3(-p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.z,  p.x,    0), vec3(-p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.z, -p.x,    0), vec3(-p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.z, -p.x,    0), vec3(-p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0, -p.z), vec3(-p.x,    0, -p.z) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0, -p.z), vec3(-p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0, -p.z), vec3(-p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.x,    0, -p.z), vec3( p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.x,    0, -p.z), vec3( p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0,  p.z), vec3(-p.x,    0,  p.z) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0,  p.z), vec3(-p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3( p.x,    0,  p.z), vec3(-p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.x,    0,  p.z), vec3( p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(-p.x,    0,  p.z), vec3( p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0,  p.z,  p.x), vec3(   0,  p.z, -p.x) )
        s( vec3(   0,  p.z,  p.x), vec3( p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0,  p.z,  p.x), vec3(-p.y, -p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0,  p.z, -p.x), vec3( p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0,  p.z, -p.x), vec3(-p.y, -p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0, -p.z,  p.x), vec3(   0, -p.z, -p.x) )
        s( vec3(   0, -p.z,  p.x), vec3( p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0, -p.z,  p.x), vec3(-p.y,  p.y, -p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0, -p.z, -p.x), vec3(-p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
        s( vec3(   0, -p.z, -p.x), vec3( p.y,  p.y,  p.y) )
    }
    
    
    C = vec4(c + c*c, 1);
}
renderpass.name: Image
